meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

subsection.content: These regulations may be cited as the Harmful Substances in Food Regulations.
Regulation 3 insofar as it applies to item 2 in Schedule 1 came into effect on 1 January 1985.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.leadIn: In these regulations, unless the context otherwise requires—
section.def: air transhipment cargo (航空轉運貨物) has the meaning assigned to it in section 2 of the Import and Export Ordinance (Cap. 60); (29 of 2000 s. 5)
air transit cargo (航空過境貨物) means any article in transit that is both imported and consigned for export in an aircraft; (29 of 2000 s. 5)
article in transit (過境物品) has the meaning assigned to it in section 2 of the Import and Export Ordinance (Cap. 60); (29 of 2000 s. 5)
cargo transhipment area of Hong Kong International Airport (機場貨物轉運區) has the meaning assigned to it in section 2 of the Import and Export Ordinance (Cap. 60); (29 of 2000 s. 5)

def.name: CondensedMilk
def.leadIn: condensed milk (煉奶) means milk which has been condensed by the evaporation of a portion of its water content, whether or not sugar has been added, and includes—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: any such milk made from skimmed milk or partly skimmed milk; and

section.def: dried milk (奶粉) means milk which has been concentrated in the form of solid or powder by removal of water, whether or not it has been sweetened, modified or compounded, and includes any such milk made from skimmed milk or partly skimmed milk; (L.N. 173 of 2011)
fish (魚) does not include live fish other than shell fish; (L.N. 173 of 1986)
follow-up formula (較大嬰兒及幼兒配方產品) has the meaning given by regulation 2(1) of the Food and Drugs (Composition and Labelling) Regulations (Cap. 132 sub. leg. W); (L.N. 86 of 2021)
food animal (食用動物) means an animal or bird commonly kept for the purpose of providing food for human consumption; (L.N. 148 of 2001)
infant formula (嬰兒配方產品) has the meaning given by regulation 2(1) of the Food and Drugs (Composition and Labelling) Regulations (Cap. 132 sub. leg. W); (L.N. 86 of 2021)

low erucic acid rapeseed oil (低芥酸菜籽油) means any vegetable oil produced from low erucic acid oil-bearing seeds of varieties derived from the Brassica napus L., Brassica rapa L. and Brassica juncea L., species; (L.N. 86 of 2021)

def.name: Meat
def.leadIn: meat (肉類) means the flesh or other edible part (including blood) of— (L.N. 148 of 2001)

section.def: milk (奶類) means cows milk, buffaloes milk and goats milk, and includes cream, separated milk and milk beverage, but does not include dried milk, condensed milk or reconstituted milk; (L.N. 215 of 2008 and L.N. 253 of 2008)

milk beverage (奶類飲品) means any beverage resulting from combining liquid milk fat with other solids derived from milk, whether exclusive of any food additive or otherwise; (L.N. 215 of 2008 and L.N. 253 of 2008)
peanut (花生) means groundnut or the seed of Arachis hypogaea L.;
peanut products (花生產品) includes oil of peanut or any product containing peanut as its ingredient;

reconstituted milk (再造奶) means products resulting from the recombining with water of milk constituents, namely, milk fat and other solids derived from milk exclusive of any other substance, and includes the products resulting from the melting of frozen concentrated milk; (L.N. 173 of 2011)
sell (售賣) includes offer, or expose for sale or have in possession for sale; (L.N. 173 of 2011)
skimmed milk (脫脂奶) includes separated milk and machine skimmed milk. (L.N. 173 of 2011)

section.name: s3
section.heading: Prohibition of import and sale of food containing certain substances in excessive concentrations
section.content: A person must not import, consign, deliver, manufacture or sell, for human consumption, any food of a description specified in Column D of Schedule 1 which contains any substance specified opposite thereto in Column B, or the description of such substance in Column C, in greater concentration than is specified opposite thereto in Column E.

section.name: s3A
section.heading: Prohibition of import and sale of certain food or oil etc. containing prohibited substances

subsection.content: A person must not import, sell or consign or deliver for sale for human consumption, any fish, meat, milk, dried milk, condensed milk or reconstituted milk which contains any substance specified in Schedule 2. (L.N. 86 of 2021)
A person must not import for human consumption any oil or fat or a mixture of oil and fat containing partially hydrogenated oil. (L.N. 86 of 2021)
A person must not sell, or consign or deliver for sale, for human consumption any food (including any oil or fat or a mixture of oil and fat) containing partially hydrogenated oil. (L.N. 86 of 2021)

section.name: s3B
section.heading: Application to air transit or air transhipment cargo

subsection.leadIn: Regulations 3 and 3A do not apply in relation to the import of any food referred to in those regulations that is air transit cargo or air transhipment cargo; but if at any time between its being brought into and taken out of Hong Kong such food is removed from the cargo transhipment area of Hong Kong International Airport then, for the purposes of regulations 3 and 3A— (L.N. 86 of 2021)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the food is deemed to be imported at the time of such removal; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the person who brought the food, or caused it to be brought, into Hong Kong as air transit cargo or air transhipment cargo is deemed to be the person who imports the food at the time of its removal,

subsection.continued: and, except to that extent, those regulations have effect as if this paragraph had not been enacted. (L.N. 86 of 2021)

subsection.leadIn: In proceedings against a person for an offence under regulation 5, being proceedings—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in relation to the import of any food referred to in regulation 3 or 3A that is air transit cargo or air transhipment cargo; and (L.N. 86 of 2021)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in which it is necessary for the prosecution to prove that, at any time between its being brought into and taken out of Hong Kong, the food was removed from the cargo transhipment area of Hong Kong International Airport,

subsection.continued: it is a defence for the person to show that he took all reasonable steps and exercised reasonable diligence to avoid such removal occurring.

subsection.leadIn: Where in any proceedings the defence provided by paragraph (2) involves an allegation that the commission of the offence was due to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the act or default of another person; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: reliance on information given by another person,

subsection.continued: the defendant is not, without the leave of the court, entitled to rely on the defence unless, not less than 10 days before the hearing of the proceedings, he has served a notice in writing on the prosecutor giving all particulars of—

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: the person who committed the act or default or gave the information; and

subsection.continued: of which he is aware at the time he serves the notice.

subsection.leadIn: A person is not entitled to rely on the defence provided by paragraph (2) by reason of his reliance on information supplied by another person, unless he shows that it was reasonable in all the circumstances for him to have relied on the information, having regard in particular to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the steps which he took, and those which might reasonably have been taken, for the purpose of verifying the information; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: whether he had any reason to disbelieve the information.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Amendment of Schedule 1
section.content: The Director of Food and Environmental Hygiene may, by notice published in the Gazette, amend the concentrations specified in Column E of Schedule 1.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Offence and penalties
section.content: Any person who contravenes regulation 3 or 3A commits an offence and is liable to a fine at level 5 and to imprisonment for 6 months.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Name in which proceedings may be brought
section.content: Without prejudice to the provisions of any other enactment relating to the prosecution of criminal offences and without prejudice to the powers of the Secretary for Justice in relation to the prosecutions of criminal offences, prosecutions for an offence under any of the provisions of these regulations may be brought in the name of the Director of Food and Environmental Hygiene.

schedule.heading: Maximum Concentration of Certain Substances Present in Specified Foods

Note 2:
The maximum concentration applies to the dry matter of the food.

section.name: s1
section.content: Dienoestrol ((E,E)-4,4’-(diethylideneethylene) diphenol) including salts and esters thereof.

section.name: s2
section.content: Diethylstilboestrol ((E)-αβ-diethylstilbene-4,4’-diol) including salts and esters thereof.

section.name: s3
section.content: Hexoestrol (meso-4,4’-(1,2-diethylethylene) diphenol) including salts and esters thereof.
